info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 01 at 6:12PM PDT until August 01 at 8:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTY... At 612 PM PDT, Moderate to heavy rain continues mainly east of Mt Charleston along Kyle Canyon Road. Flash Flooding remains likely especially along and near Harris Canyon Wash. Rainfall estimates of 1 to 2 inches so far have been observed. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Las Vegas, Rainbow Canyon, Mt. Charleston, Spring Mountains, Centennial Hills, Hilltop Campground, Mahogany Grove Campground, Kyle Canyon Campground, Fletcher View Campground, Mary Jane Falls Campground, Dolomite Campground and Mcwilliams Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
